abstract: Comcast and Time Warner have agreed to an online streaming deal, and analysts are anticipating a Netflix-style service from Amazon.
snippet: Comcast and Time Warner have agreed to an online streaming deal, and analysts are anticipating a Netflix-style service from Amazon.
lead_paragraph: The increasing importance of Internet rights for television channels and shows has been vividly demonstrated twice in the last few days.

headline.main: Two Hints at Stepped-Up Media Rivalry in Online Streaming
headline.print_headline: Two Hints at Stepped-Up Media Rivalry in Online Streaming
